contextId.information: Paul uses two similar words to emphasize moral goodness. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])

The phrase "deep respect and trembling" uses two similar words to emphasize the idea of honor and their attitude and reaction. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
